description: Rugged, multifunctional pants designed for use in and out of the water, made of quick-drying 95% nylon (65% recycled)/5% spandex with a DWR (durable water repellent) finish and 40+ UPF sun protection.
name: Patagonia Outdoor Everyday Pants - Mens

specs.value: Rugged, multifunctional pants designed for use in and out of the water, made of quick-drying 95% nylon (65% recycled)
Elastic waistband with adjustable, integrated buckle belt
Envelope front pockets with snap closures and drainage
Two zippered thigh pockets with drainage
